title: Error Logs
body: Everytime i go to update my league it says i get error logs and have to try again and the whole update gets reset an tries again, not sure what to do about this problem

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and reinstall through that, let me know if that helps.
